name: SpaceSheep
description: Some friends of mine gathered to make a game for this jam and I wasn't formally invited because I'm a Jon Snow of games. So I decided to look for some tutorials and try to make a game of my own, and I found this Game Maker thing and some further resources online (am I gonna be arrested or something?).I feel like cheating but it was a really cool sleepless experience and I wanted to share it. The game is about a sheep that was abducted by aliens to save their famous extraterrestrial friends (lame, I know). Anyway, I hope you have fun and don't get too hard on me.
